name: Love Lines
description:
Aren't you tired of meaningless clashes, wars, sagas and other boring games out there? You want to have fun without spending a lot of time and money, and you want to feel satisfaction of completing a game? Then Love Lines is perfect for you!

It's very simple lines puzzle game, where you should connect fluffy creatures together so they can fall in love and live happily! :)

Simply connect all the fluffies of same colors to win. Sounds fun? Of course it is! And you can play it everywhere at anytime, game won't take much of your time, but watch out, it's very addictive game and you may not want to stop until you finish it :)

What to expect:

* Amazing 100 puzzles

* Funny cute characters

* Fun and simple gameplay

* No boring tap tap tap tutorial!!!

* No in-app purchases (unless you'll be so kind and support us after completion the game)

* Funny sounds and addictive melody :)

* No online needed (but preferable), can be played everywhere!

* 3G, 4G friendly (around 22mb only!!!)
